summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1519, for the improvement of 10th Avenue South in the City of Seattle, from Yesler Way to Washington Street, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 16340 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
